isConsumingScheduledOp().details: Returns true only in the context of a delayed restricted call, at the moment that the scheduled operation is being consumed. Prevents denial of service for delayed restricted calls in the case that the contract performs attacker controlled calls.

setAuthority(address).details: Transfers control to a new authority. The caller must be the current authority.

depositLimitPerToken(address).notice: Mapping of token => deposit limit per 24h window.

depositWindowPerToken(address).notice: Current window accounting per token for deposits and withdrawals

getCurrentDepositUsed(address).notice: Returns the current used amount in the active window for deposits for a token

getCurrentWithdrawUsed(address).notice: Returns the current used amount in the active window for withdrawals for a token

setDepositLimit(address,uint256).notice: Set the per-24h deposit limit for a token

setLimitsBatch(address[],uint256[],uint2.notice: Batch configure limits for multiple tokens

setWithdrawLimit(address,uint256).notice: Set the per-24h withdraw limit for a token
